content: this crochet pattern of cute rainbow baby rattle with teether ring will be a great baby shower gift pregnancy gift for mom to be or birthday gift for the little ones in your life my instructions are organized and are very clear to understand the pdf pattern has 12 pages and a lot of photos skill level beginner finish size when using similar materials the rainbow rattle will be ~ 4 1/4 length and 3 1/2 high materials original yarn drops cotton light 50% cotton 50% polyester 105 m/115 yards per 50 g skein in 4 colores alternative yarn yarn art jeans drops muskat gazzal baby cotton or any yarn with approx yardage crochet hook - 3 mm scissors tapestry needle to sew in ends stuffing polyfil yarn straps etc 24 mm rattle ball https //clck ru/tosev wooden ring diameter ~ 2 5 cm time - about 1 hour abbreviations all stitches are listed in us terms techniques used single_crochet increasing in the next stitch sewing the pattern is for personal use only no part of it including visual content may be copied reproduced or redirected ​create craft crochet thank you so much
